original_title: US to dismantle center tasked with countering ‘Russian influence’ — RT World News
article_summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz faces opposition from coalition partner SPD over plans to send troops to Ukraine, with the SPD only supporting deployment if the US leads. Trump has ruled out US ground troops in Ukraine, but may offer air support if hostilities end. Merz warns Europe should participate in potential security guarantees to Kiev, but Foreign Minister Wadephul warns Germany's military capacity is stretched. Meanwhile, Israel launches an operation to take over Gaza City, with Prime Minister Netanyahu ordering a shortened timeline for the defeat of Hamas.</s>
